body:
Comment 5 by **grahamalexanderharris**: 
Yes, I hadn't thought to check the amount of RAM, this is what "free -b" outputs:
             total       used       free     shared    buffers     cached
Mem:     126545920   35917824   90628096          0    8544256   17977344
-/+ buffers/cache:    9396224  117149696
Swap:            0          0          0

~125MB, which is strange because there should be 256MB!
I'll try adding some swap and trying again.
